documentDetails.question: who is the Vendor? Vendor Name will be followed by 'vendor' in the contract.Sentence will have 'by' and 'between company name and 'vendor name.Answer it in short form
What is the contract ID? It usually starts with two characters or contains numeric values. It usually n first row of the first page of every contract.Answer it in short form

what is the term start date? It could be commencement Date,Start Date,Services Start Date,Term start date,contract start date.It should be in Date Format(Could be in any of the date formats like mm/dd/yyyy or december 1st,2022 or 1st December 2022.Answer it in short form

What is the term end date ? You can consider keywords like end date, services end date, term end date, contract end date to identify the term end date. Once the term end date is identified, add 1 year to it and name it as next renewal year,Give both dates in list format the first index value wil be term end date and next value will be Next renewal year in date format.Answer it in short form
Can you give me the Scope of the work after reading the document. Answer it in short paragraph.
After reading the document can you identify what kind of contract it is and if you found multiple contracts in a single doucment give the result in list format

After reading the document can you identify what kind of expense it is and if you found multiple contracts in a single doucment give the result in list format. Once you populate the answer if answer consists hosted technology soloutions then change it to 'Software as service', if answer consists Profesinal serrvies or outourcing services or Implementation Services or Statement of Work or Consulting Services - Fixed Bid or OEM,If contract does not contain Hosted Technology Solutions then it is a Software contract,If the contract contains combination of the above then it is a bundled contract, Give answer in a list format
Can you extract the Number of License in Contract, the answer can be identified from the keywords like Quantity, Number of Users, Number of Licenses, Give answer
Can you extract the Cost per License, the answer can be identified from the keywords like Cost per Unit or Cost per License or License Fees, Give answer
Can you extract the Total License Cost, the answer can be identified from the keywords like License Cost or Software License Cost, Give answer
Can you extract the Renewal cost, If you are able to extract the renewal cost conider that else it will be same as Current Contract Cost + CPI, if any mentioned in the contract, Give answer

After reading the document Can you compute the Maintenance Cost by number of hours %Professional Services, the answer can be identified from the keywords like Professional Services or Outsourcing Services or Implementation Services or Consulting Services, Give answer
After reading the document Can you compute the Maintenance Cost by number of Hours e.g. % of Licence fees, the answer can be identified from the keywords like Maintenance Fees, Give answer
After reading the document can you extract any other charges apart from Maintenance Cost, like One Time Charges, Implementation, Miscellaneous, Give answer

What is the most recent year's contract value in the document, It Will be present after Payment Schedule or Fee Schedule or project Fees or Service Fees or Traffic Fees Will generally have numeric format and currency symbol before it. If you idetify multiple contract years in the same document return the years in python dictonary format with key as date and value will be the extracted contract value, Give answer
What is the CPI % like 2%, 3% .. etc It will be in % also can be identify with the keywords like Increase the fees,but not to exceed, After renewal term, Give answer
What is the Contractual Obligation from the document, you can extract it from the keywords likeTrack the word/text   Obligation,Contract Obligation, Termination. Give answer
What is the Credit Note mentioned in the document. Give answer
What is the Tax Impact mentioned in the document. Give answer
